name.japanese: ぽかぼかフレンドタイム

description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu,
punches the target with full force.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu,
punches the target with full force.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: After inflicting damage, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn, including status moves. This effect is applied after move type-changing abilities, such as Pixilate and Normalize.
effect.shortEffect: After inflicting damage, causes all Normal-type moves to become Electric-type for the remainder of the turn.
